warning.falling_blocks:one: {{count, number}} block will fall under gravity when placed.
warning.falling_blocks:other: {{count, number}} blocks will fall under gravity when placed.
warning.high_triangle_count:one: The loaded mesh has {{count, number}} triangles, consider simplifying it in a program such as Blender.
warning.high_triangle_count:other: The loaded mesh has {{count, number}} triangle, consider simplifying it in a program such as Blender.
warning.incorrect_materials: Some materials were not loaded correctly.
warning.missing_mtl: Could not parse .mtl file location from .obj file.
warning.missing_vertex_normals: Some vertices do not have normal data, this may cause voxels to be aligned incorrectly.
warning.palette_blocks_missing_atlas_textures:on: ${{count, number}} palette block are missing atlas textures and will not be used.
warning.palette_blocks_missing_atlas_textures:ot: ${{count, number}} palette blocks are missing atlas textures and will not be used.
warning.schematic_unsupported_blocks:one: ${{count, number}} block are not supported by the .schematic format. Stone blocks will be used in their place. Try using the 'schematic-friendly' palette, or use another exporter.
warning.schematic_unsupported_blocks:other: {{count, number}} blocks are not supported by the .schematic format. Stone blocks will be used in their place. Try using the 'schematic-friendly' palette, or use another exporter.
warning.structure_blocks_maximum_size: Structure blocks only support structures of size 48x48x48, blocks outside this range will be removed.
warning.triangle_threshold_exceeded: Will not render mesh as the number of triangles exceeds the threshold of {{threshold, number}} (see config.json).
